snippet: The proposed acquisition demonstrates the increasing consolidation of health insurers as the federal health care law has put enormous pressure on companies in the industry to better control costs.
abstract: The proposed acquisition demonstrates the increasing consolidation of health insurers as the federal health care law has put enormous pressure on companies in the industry to better control costs.

byline.original: By REED ABELSON and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: WellPoint to Acquire Amerigroup Amid Health Care Overhaul
headline.print_headline: WellPoint Will Buy Amerigroup to Expand in Medicaid and Medicare Markets
